page.title: 13Transport
page.content:
Public transport in this area is very sparce and so residents have to depend, in the main, on their own cars, bicycles or legs.
There are a few public buses each day that pass through the area on route between Hereford and Kington and one bus on Fridays that goes to Leominster.
If there are primary or secondary school children living in the area wishing to travel to Weobley or Leominster, then a school bus will run round to collect and return them to a point close to their homes.
Two private factory buses carry out the same function for members for staff.
